site_url.description: The URL of the site for which the search analytics data is being reported.

search_type.description: The type of search query (e.g., web, image, video) that generated the search analytics data.

date.description: The date for which the search analytics data is being reported.

clicks.description: The total number of times users clicked on the search result for the site URL on the specific date.

impressions.description: The number of times the site URL was displayed in the search results to users on the specific date.

ctr.description: The click-through rate (CTR) represents the percentage of total impressions that resulted in a click to the site URL.

position.description: The average position of the site URL in the search results pages for the specific date.
